no, sorry. I tried just now with no luck.

this happens if we try to remove a progress monitor part from a control it was not attached to. In this case due to some weird timing and an unecessary if statement, we did not attach the part to the cancel button, but subsequetly tried to remove it.

removed the unecessary if statement in LaunchConfigurationsDialog#run
